name: Imaginarium
description:
Discover a new world filled with interesting creatures, mysterious places and amazing stories. Will you be able to develop your own settlement or discover all the secret places of the world "Imaginarium"? Only time will tell... Enemies... And the inhabitants of this world



Many worlds will be available to you to explore the universe "Imaginarium". From green and spacious meadows, to terrible dark forests in which you can now and then stumble upon a monster. However, do not think that moving between worlds will be such an easy task. In some worlds you will have to sail on boats, in some even fly on a special spacecraft that you can collect only having their builders and engineers that will be able to help you in creating a spaceship. Also, each world will contain its own unique feature, which will be a big plus or a terrible minus...



The main gameplay mechanics will be survival, but in addition to the goal to survive, the second goal will be-to try to create an Empire. You can create your own goal to which you will need to go: survive in dangerous caves and get a lot of treasures, build your village of barbarians, and become its king, or become a trader and greedy miser. For all these purposes, you will help the inhabitants of the "Imaginarium". Some will become your faithful friends and helpers, others will turn against you and will try to kill you.
